long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily organize and manage your AI prompts in folders. Use the AI prompts in any LLM or AI, such as Gemini, OpenAI ChatGPT, Anthropic Claude, Perplexity, Grok and more!

How it works:
- Create folders and add prompts to categorize them efficiently.
- Edit, delete, or search through your saved prompts directly from the extension popup.
- Use clipboard integration to quickly insert copied text into your prompts, allowing you to speed up and enhance your AI workflow.

Features:
- Supports organizing prompts in custom folders.
- Ability to search through folders and prompts.
- Edit, delete, or copy prompts with a simple click.
- Clipboard integration for inserting copied text into prompts.
- Works entirely offline with data stored on your device via Chrome Sync. Syncs your prompts between your logged in Chrome devices.
- Clean and intuitive interface
- Fast and lightweight - won’t slow down your browsing.

No account needed, no complicated settings. Just install and start organizing your prompts.
